summary: Put simply - a calm spell that can be used on undead
descriptionHtml:
I was slightly annoyed at the limited use of 'turn undead' and wanted to have a low level spell for beginner characters that could be used for calming undead. (instead of waiting until illusion level 90...)

As per 'turn undead' this spell is part of the restoration school.

I have added it to the levelled lists, so it can be bought from Colette & other merchants.

Enjoy
author: MHedges
